message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: public int[] youMakeMeOdd(int[] arr){
  int[] odds;
  int count = 0;
  for(int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
    if(arr[i] % 2 != 0){
      count++;
    }
  }
  odds = new int[count];
  int index = 0;
  for(int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++){
    if(arr[i] % 2 != 0){
      odds[index] = arr[i];
      index++;
    }
  }
  return odds;
}
<<<explanation>>>: In your code, you are initializing the odds array with the same length as the input array, which will result in 0s for the even numbers. To fix this, you can first count the number of odd numbers in the input array, then initialize the odds array with the correct length. Finally, you can iterate through the input array again and only add the odd numbers to the odds array.
